attr.title: REDPULSE
attr.desc: REDPULSE is a run 'n gun game inspired by bullet hell shooters that encourages speedy and aggressive gameplay.
attr.inst: Download the REDPULSE v1.1.zip from Itch.io and extract all files into the assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the `REDPULSE v1.1.zip` from [Itch.io](https://boghog.itch.io/redpulse) and extract all files into the `assets` folder.
